entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Beauceville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:11 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Beauceville 9:00 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -7.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: SW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local blowing snow early this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
